column5: Hello my name is Evelyn murrell I.'m a Gospel artist for CD every praise ...bishop hezekiah walker jjhairston ....Stella award .  2013 ( Asusa next generation chior 2013 ! Everything aspect of my life is planned , work ..social etc..( girl in bubble - lisd prevention wherever I go so do police and my daughter on davidson ave ..shelter ( Evelyn place ,) ..my story trauma . .I'd like to help other women stories of violence. ...... I'm former public official ...for the city of new York . .....my story ....Lowe's USA and Walgreens saved my life ! ....I live at 209 east 118 th street apt 2bd new York NY 10935 ..Evelyn.murrell@yahoo.com .  646-377-6022.   I'm interested in how children learn.  The IEP process not where it needs needs to be further worked to help children all over world ! So they don't go to jail . Or become lost ! ...ps I'm looking for sister zenja murrell ..teacher with two master's degree .  She was in Florida then Canada Ontario then never seen again ? .....I'm drug free   ?
